cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 15 mi S of Cayo Largo, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: continuing WNW across western Cuba this evening, then turning northwest into the central-northwestern Gulf of Mexico toward the Texas-Louisiana coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-west Gulf Coast (near the TX/LA border)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Cuban south and west coasts today, then U.S. northwest Gulf coast later this week
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at San Juan, PR
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated passing showers possible; no heavy rainfall expected
